author: Lego_fan_
title: Luke and yoda
review:
Lego set #41627 is a great addition to any Star Wars or Brick Headz collection. 

This set includes a Luke Skywalker Brick Headz, and a half size Yoda Brick Headz.

The Luke is your usual size Brick Headz. He has a bunch of cool was of getting shapes with these bricks. He includes a blaster, a light saber, a display stand,and some interesting pieces for his hair. He also has an exclusive torso printed part. 

Yoda is a half size Brick Headz and is a very neat build. He includes sand green parts!, a display stand, a cane, an exclusive torso print, some hair detailing on his back side and his ears. 

These sets are very cool for display and i recommend this set to any Star Wars or Birck Headz collector.
